title: (BONUS EP) Scottish Crimes
description:
This month, the gals don their best tartan to chat about a misty, mysterious country. Topics include a very large hedge, some time-traveling rings, and a torturous jail correspondence. See if you can choke down some Scotch, return that rock to its rightful owner, and tune in for Scottish Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
